about_the_game:
HORROR
This is the finest parody of cheap indie horrors. You woke up from with amnesia in an abandoned house. Strangely enough, someone conveniently left some papers that will help you to get out. Also, there is a cheap flashlight that works really bad with extra low charged batteries. Nobody is there to help you - so help yourself!
IMERSIVE PLOT
Feel immerse into immersive plot with not a lot of plot twists. Re discover yourself as unnamed guy with amnesia. Everyone left him, why? Nobody really knows except that guy who wrote all those notes.
REALISTISM
Throw and break boxes, because this is fun. Run away from something. Be scared of your own footsteps. Resolve easy puzzles left for you by your kidnapper. He became a monster not because he was extremely smart, so don't expect much.

Features:


  • AMNESIA
  • FLASHLIGHT (slightly broken)
  • LOCKED DOORS
  • SCREAMERS (scary)
  • GENERIC MYSTERIES
  • MAIN MENU
